title: Why is this Client so broken
body: The Game can't even take screenshots correctly man like how

replies.body: Odd - I haven't seen that issue. I mean, the game stops rendering for 5+ seconds when I hit F12 to take a screenshot, but it does at least save the image. I see that folder contains some other screenshots that that did work. Did you notice anything unusual when taking screenshots 4 and 5?
5 seconds??? for me it is like 0.5 sec
